info.title: Scheduling
info.description: Unified OpenAPI specification for scheduling domain

get.description:
Get appointments list for a business. This endpoint is rate-limited per business.

**Rate Limit:** Returns 429 with `APPOINTMENTS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED` when rate limit is exceeded.

parameters.description: Business ID. If not provided, uses the business associated with the authenticated user.
parameters.name: business_id

parameters.description: Filter by client ID
parameters.name: client_id

parameters.description: Filter by staff ID
parameters.name: staff_id

parameters.description: Filter by appointment state(s). Multiple states can be comma-separated. Valid values: rejected, scheduled, done, cancelled, pending_reschedule, reschedule. Example: state=done,rejected
parameters.name: state

parameters.description: Filter appointments starting from this time (ISO 8601 format)
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Filter appointments ending before this time (ISO 8601 format)
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: Filter appointments created on or after this date (ISO 8601 format)
parameters.name: from_created_date

parameters.description: Filter by specific appointment UIDs (comma-separated)
parameters.name: uids

parameters.description: Filter by initiator. Set to true to only show staff-initiated appointments
parameters.name: initiate_by_staff

parameters.description: Group results by a field
parameters.name: group_by

parameters.description: Sort order. Format: field:direction. Multiple sort fields can be comma-separated. Example: updated:DESC,start_at:ASC,created:DESC
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: Page number of results. Default: 1
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Default: 25. **Maximum: 25** (requests for more will be capped)
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response
parameters.name: fields

429.description: Rate limit exceeded. Error code: APPOINTMENTS_LIMIT_EXCEEDED

parameters.description: Appointment id
parameters.name: appointment_id

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

500.description: Internal Server Error

get.description:
Get bookings for a client. Returns appointments and event attendances associated with the authenticated client.

**Note:** If `matter_uid` is provided, returns bookings for that conversation/matter. Otherwise, returns bookings for the authenticated client.

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return per page
parameters.name: per_page

parameters.description: Page offset (0-based). Combined with per_page for pagination. Example: per_page=10, offset=1 returns records 11-20
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Business UID
parameters.name: business_id

parameters.description: Matter/Conversation UID. When provided, returns bookings for this specific matter instead of the client
parameters.name: matter_uid

parameters.description: Filter by specific booking UIDs (comma-separated)
parameters.name: uids

parameters.description: If true, returns only past bookings. If false (default), includes future bookings and virtual recurring instances
parameters.name: passed

parameters.description: Filter bookings starting after this time (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to current time if not specified
parameters.name: start_time

parameters.description: Filter bookings starting before this time (ISO 8601 format). Defaults to 2 years from start_time if not specified
parameters.name: end_time

parameters.description: Client's browser timezone for proper time display
parameters.name: browser_time_zone

parameters.description: Include waitlist entries in results. Default: false
parameters.name: include_waitlists

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

500.description: Internal server error

post.description:
Create a new booking (appointment or event registration).

**Rate Limit:** This endpoint is rate-limited per business. Returns 429 with `BOOKING_LIMIT_EXCEEDED` when exceeded.

**Booking Types:**
- **Appointment**: Requires `service_id`, `staff_id`, and either `start_time` or `optional_times`
- **Event**: Requires `event_instance_id`
- **Multi-booking**: Requires `service_id` as an array with multiple services

**Validation:**
- Client restrictions are checked - some services may not allow certain clients to book
- Deleted matters will return `MATTER_DELETED` error

412.description: Precondition failed - booking violation or deleted matter

example.error: Not allowed to register to this service

422.description: Validation failed - timeslot unavailable or already registered

booking_type.description: Type of booking: 'appointment', 'event', or 'multi_booking'. Auto-detected based on parameters if not provided

service_id.description: Service UID. Required for appointments. Can be an array for multi-bookings (comma-separated or array)

start_time.description: Booking start time in ISO 8601 format. Required for immediate approval appointments. Either start_time or optional_times must be provided

optional_times.description: Array of proposed times for single-choice approval mode. Either start_time or optional_times must be provided

event_instance_id.description: Event instance UID. Required for event bookings

client_id.description: Client UID. If not provided, uses authenticated client

matter_uid.description: Matter/Conversation UID to associate the booking with

waitlist_uid.description: Waitlist UID if converting from waitlist to booking

time_zone.description: Timezone for the booking. Default: UTC

preferred_language.description: Preferred language for new client creation

form_data.description: Additional form data. Required when service location is 'Client will set the address at booking' - include meeting_interaction_details in meeting_details

post.description:
Cancel a booking (appointment or event attendance).

**Booking Type Detection:**
- If `event_instance_id` is provided, treated as event cancellation
- Otherwise, treated as appointment cancellation

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to cancel this booking

500.description: Internal Server Error

booking_id.description: Booking (appointment or event attendance) UID to cancel

event_instance_id.description: Event instance UID. Include this for event cancellations

message.description: Optional cancellation message to send to the business

put.description:
Update the RSVP state of a booking. This is used for confirming attendance.

**Important:** Only `confirmed` is a valid RSVP state. Any other value will return a 403 Forbidden error.

parameters.description: Booking UID (appointment, event_instance, or event_attendance)
parameters.name: booking_uid

parameters.description: New RSVP state. **Only 'confirmed' is valid.** Any other value returns 403 Forbidden
parameters.name: new_rsvp_state

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Invalid RSVP state (only 'confirmed' is allowed) or not authorized

500.description: Internal Server Error

business_id.description: Business UID. Either business_id or portal_id is required

parameters.description: Event attendance UID
parameters.name: event_attendance_uid

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

404.description: Not Found - Event attendance not found

500.description: Internal Server Error

parameters.description: The id of the event instance
parameters.name: event_instance_id

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

404.description: Not Found - Event instance not found

500.description: Internal Server Error

post.description:
Register for an event waitlist. When the event has available spots, waitlisted clients can be converted to attendees.

**Use Case:** When an event is full, clients can join the waitlist to be notified when spots become available.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

500.description: Internal Server Error

event_instance_id.description: Event instance UID to join waitlist for

client_id.description: Client UID. If not provided, uses authenticated client

matter_uid.description: Matter/Conversation UID to associate the waitlist entry with

time_zone.description: Client's timezone for proper time display

put.description: Cancel a waitlist registration. Removes the client from the event waitlist.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Not authorized to cancel this waitlist entry

404.description: Not Found - Waitlist entry not found

500.description: Internal Server Error

event_instance_uid.description: Event instance UID to cancel waitlist for

client_uid.description: Client UID. If not provided, uses authenticated client

matter_uid.description: Matter/Conversation UID associated with the waitlist entry

get.description:
Get a list of resource types for a business, with pagination

Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Max: 100
Sort by fields. Example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort
with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted resource types in the response

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid business context is required

408.description: Request Timeout - Request exceeded timeout limit

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

post.description:
Create a new resource type.

**Requires:** `account.settings.manage` permission

**Feature Flags:** Both `pkg.sch.resources` AND `resources` must be enabled

Available for **Staff Tokens**

name.description: The name of the resource type

services.description: Array of service UIDs that require this resource type. When a service is associated with a resource type, bookings for that service will require an available resource of this type.

initial_resource_count.description: Number of initial resources to create automatically when the resource type is created. Each resource will be named sequentially (e.g., 'Treatment Room 1', 'Treatment Room 2').

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

401.description: Valid business context is required

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to create resource types (requires account.settings.manage permission)

408.description: Request Timeout - Request exceeded timeout limit

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Request data failed validation

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

get.description:
Get a specific resource type by UID

Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the ResourceType

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

401.description: Valid business context is required

403.description: Not authorized to access this resource type

408.description: Request Timeout - Request exceeded timeout limit

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

put.description:
Update a resource type's properties. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.

**Requires:** `account.settings.manage` permission

**Feature Flags:** Both `pkg.sch.resources` AND `resources` must be enabled

Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the ResourceType

name.description: The name of the resource type

services.description: Array of service UIDs that require this resource type. This replaces the entire services list - to add a service, include all existing services plus the new one.

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

401.description: Valid business context is required

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to update this resource type (requires account.settings.manage permission)

408.description: Request Timeout - Request exceeded timeout limit

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Request data failed validation

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

delete.description:
Soft-delete a resource type. The resource type will be marked as deleted but can still be retrieved using `with_deleted=true`.

**Note:** Deleting a resource type does NOT automatically delete its associated resources. Resources must be deleted separately.

**Requires:** `account.settings.manage` permission

**Feature Flags:** Both `pkg.sch.resources` AND `resources` must be enabled

Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the ResourceType

200.description: Resource type soft-deleted successfully. The resource type will have a `deleted_at` timestamp set.

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

401.description: Valid business context is required

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to delete this resource type (requires account.settings.manage permission)

408.description: Request Timeout - Request exceeded timeout limit

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

get.description:
Get all resources, with pagination and filtering by resource type or service

Available for **Staff Tokens**

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of results

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: How many items to return per page. Max: 100
Sort by fields. Example: sort=created_at:asc,updated_at:desc
parameters.name: sort
resource_type_uid
parameters.description: Filter by resource type UID(s). Accepts single value or array of values. Example: ?resource_type_uid=abc123 or ?resource_type_uid=abc123&resource_type_uid=def456

parameters.name: service_uid
parameters.description: Filter resources by service UID that requires their resource type

parameters.name: with_deleted
parameters.description: Include deleted resources in the response

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: Filter by resource UID(s). Accepts single value or array of values. Example: ?uid=abc123 or ?uid=abc123&uid=def456

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

401.description: Unauthorized - Valid business context is required

408.description: Request Timeout - Request exceeded timeout limit

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

post.description:
Create a new resource instance belonging to a resource type.

**Requires:** `account.settings.manage` permission

**Feature Flags:** Both `pkg.sch.resources` AND `resources` must be enabled

**Limit:** Maximum 10 resources per resource type

Available for **Staff Tokens**

resource_type_uid.description: The UID of the resource type this instance belongs to. The resource type must exist and belong to the same business.

302.description: OAuth redirect when no authentication token provided

401.description: Valid business context is required

403.description: Forbidden: Resources feature is not enabled or not authorized to create resources (requires account.settings.manage permission)

408.description: Request Timeout - Request exceeded timeout limit

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Request data failed validation (e.g., exceeded 10 resources per type limit)

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

get.description:
Retrieve availability time slots for a specific business within a date range

 **Only available for Directory Tokens**

parameters.name: business_uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the business

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date (YYYY-MM-DD)

400.description:
Bad Request - Invalid parameters. Common causes:
- Missing required `start_date` or `end_date`
- Invalid date format (must be YYYY-MM-DD)
- Start date is after end date

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

403.description: Forbidden - Only Directory tokens can access this endpoint

422.description: Validation Error - Business logic validation failed (e.g., invalid staff availability data)

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

get.description:
Retrieve availability time slots for multiple businesses in a directory. Returns paginated results with available booking slots for each business.

**Only available for Directory Tokens**

**Rate Limiting:** Uses a distributed lock per directory. Concurrent requests for the same directory will receive a 429 error.

**Timeout:** 10 seconds maximum response time

parameters.name: date_start
parameters.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format

parameters.name: date_end
parameters.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. **Maximum 7 days** from start date.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. **0-based** (first page is 0).

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page. **Maximum and default is 10.**

parameters.name: scheduling_enabled
parameters.description: Filter businesses by online scheduling status. When `true` (default), only returns businesses with online scheduling enabled. When `false`, returns businesses with scheduling disabled.

400.description:
Invalid request parameters. Common causes:
- Missing required `date_start` or `date_end`
- Invalid date format (must be YYYY-MM-DD)
- Date range exceeds 7 days

401.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing bearer token

403.description: Forbidden - only Directory tokens can access this endpoint. Staff tokens and other token types are not permitted.

422.description: Validation Error - Business logic validation failed (e.g., invalid staff availability data)

429.description: Too Many Requests - another request is currently processing for this directory. Wait a few seconds and retry.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

504.description: Gateway Timeout - Request exceeded 10 second timeout. Try reducing the date range or number of businesses.

get.description: Retrieve availability slots for scheduling based on specified criteria. At least one of resource_type_uids, resource_uids, or staff_uids must be provided.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start time for availability search in UTC. Must be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End time for availability search in UTC. Must be in ISO 8601 format.

parameters.name: service_uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the service

parameters.name: resource_type_uids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of resource type UIDs. At least one of resource_type_uids, resource_uids, or staff_uids must be provided.

parameters.name: resource_uids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of resource UIDs. At least one of resource_type_uids, resource_uids, or staff_uids must be provided.

parameters.name: staff_uids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of staff UIDs. At least one of resource_type_uids, resource_uids, or staff_uids must be provided.

parameters.name: slot_duration
parameters.description: Desired duration of each availability slot in minutes. If not specified, uses the service's default duration.

parameters.name: slot_interval
parameters.description: Interval between slot start times in minutes. Controls how frequently slots are offered (e.g., every 15 minutes vs every 30 minutes).

parameters.name: padding_before
parameters.description: Buffer time required before each slot in minutes. Use this for setup time or travel time between appointments. The padding time will be blocked but not shown to clients.

parameters.name: padding_after
parameters.description: Buffer time required after each slot in minutes. Use this for cleanup time or notes. The padding time will be blocked but not shown to clients.

parameters.name: exclude_booking_uid
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a booking to exclude from busy slots calculation when determining availability. When provided, the specified booking is temporarily removed from the busy slots list before calculating available time slots. This is essential for rescheduling scenarios where you need to check if the original time slot would be available without the current booking, or for conflict detection when validating potential overlaps. Example: If booking 'abc123' is scheduled from 2:00-3:00 PM and you want to reschedule it, passing exclude_booking_uid=abc123 will show 2:00-3:00 PM as available (assuming no other bookings conflict). If other bookings exist during that time, the slot remains busy.

value.message: start_time must be a valid ISO date format
slot_interval is not supported without slot_duration

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

404.description: Not Found - Service or specified resources not found

422.description: Validation Error - Business logic validation failed

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unexpected error occurred

504.description: Gateway Timeout - Request exceeded 30 second timeout. Try narrowing your query with specific filters or a shorter time range.

arrival_window_value.description: Optional for appointment only .Arrival window value is in minutes and limited to 540 (9 hours)

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

interaction_details.description: Address. Required when service location set to: Client will set the address at booking

time_zone.description: Default is set to UTC if not provided

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

booking_id.description: Booking (appointment/event) uid. (Can also be an array for batch cancel)

event_instance_id.description: Event instance uid. Required for event.

parameters.description: Booking (appointment/event) uid
parameters.name: booking_id

allow_double_booking.description: Should allow overlapping with a different booking if time/duration is changed (True by default)

auto_follow_up_hours.description: How many hours after the booking to send the automatic follow up message

interaction_details.description: Details of the meeting (address/ phone number

meeting_reminder_sms_1.description: Should send the client an SMS with the first reminder

meeting_reminder_sms_2.description: Should send the client an SMS with the second reminder

message.description: A message to be sent to the client after updating the booking

notify_client.description: If true a message about the update with the 'message' field would be sent to the client

padding.description: The padding duration before of the booking

remind_before_in_hours_1.description: How many hours before the booking to send the first reminder

remind_before_in_hours_2.description: How many hours before the booking to send the second reminder

sms_booking_confirmation.description: Should send the client an SMS with the booking confirmation

start_time.description: The start time of the booking in UTC (ISO 8601 format)'
